attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown do something good for the people Re-nationalise the railways to give the people of this country an efficient cheaper alernative to travel to work and play instead of susidising a costly scheme for the few

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
